title: How To Stop Hating Your Legs
itunes:title: How To Stop Hating Your Legs
description:
Get the Free Course here:
https://phit.click/freecourse

 

On this podcast we talk about the drama we each have about our legs! Legs have always been a source of pain for both Corinne and Kathy, and they share their journey through weight loss and thought work around wearing shorts for the first time in years and accepting their legs just the way they are.

If you can identify with struggles with body image, you'll get some great tips today on learning to accept your body and finding a bit of self-love.
